Claim_Description: Saudi Arabia designated Major Non-NATO Ally by Trump
Evidence_Summary: Trump designated Saudi Arabia MNNA on November 18, 2025 during MBS White House visit
Notes_on_Accuracy: Date confirmed as Nov 18-19 2025; includes F-35 deal approval

Claim_Description: $1 trillion investment pledge from Saudi Arabia to US
Evidence_Summary: MBS pledged to increase investment to $1T; however initial White House signing showed $600B with later revision to ~$1T. Economists questioned whether full amount would materialize.
Additional_Sources: CNBC, Military.com, White House Fact Sheet
Notes_on_Accuracy: Amount announced but details remain elusive; signage at conference showed $300B cumulative deals

Claim_Description: Strategic Mutual Defence Agreement signed between Saudi Arabia and Pakistan
Evidence_Summary: SMDA signed September 17, 2025 in Riyadh by MBS and PM Shehbaz Sharif. Agreement states aggression against either country is aggression against both.
Additional_Sources: Al Jazeera, Chatham House, Atlantic Council, CSIS
Notes_on_Accuracy: Full text not published; nuclear umbrella provision ambiguous per Reuters

Claim_Description: Turkey seeking to join Saudi-Pakistan defense pact (Islamic NATO)
Evidence_Summary: Turkey FM Hakan Fidan confirmed talks on Jan 15, 2026. Bloomberg reported advanced stage negotiations.
Additional_Sources: India Today, Zee News, 24 News HD
Notes_on_Accuracy: Talks confirmed but no formal accession yet

Claim_Description: DOGE shut down USAID operations and cut federal workforce
Evidence_Summary: USAID faced $6.5B in cuts; ~10,000 staffers placed on leave; agency folded into State Dept by November 2025. Federal workforce down 270,000+ from start of year.
Notes_on_Accuracy: Professor Nichols estimates 720,200+ deaths from aid cuts as of Jan 2026

Claim_Description: DOGE workforce cuts achieved but spending increased
Evidence_Summary: Cato Institute: DOGE had no noticeable effect on spending trajectory but achieved largest peacetime workforce reduction on record. Government spending up $248B per Yahoo Finance.
Additional_Sources: Cato Institute, NYT, Wall Street Journal
Notes_on_Accuracy: Original $2T savings promise revised to $150B; actual savings disputed

Claim_Description: Saudi F-15s bombed UAE-backed forces in Mukalla, Yemen
Evidence_Summary: Saudi-led coalition struck Mukalla port Dec 30, 2025 targeting weapons shipment for UAE-backed STC. Coalition claimed no casualties.
Additional_Sources: Al Jazeera, PBS, CNN, Middle East Eye
Notes_on_Accuracy: Triggered UAE withdrawal announcement; unprecedented Saudi-UAE friction

Claim_Description: Chinese FM Wang Yi visited Saudi Arabia during December convergence window
Evidence_Summary: Wang Yi visited Saudi Arabia Dec 14, 2025 meeting MBS. China pledged to be most trustworthy partner in Saudi development.
Notes_on_Accuracy: 35th anniversary of diplomatic relations; visa exemption agreement signed

Claim_Description: DOJ released Epstein files Dec 19 with redaction failures
Evidence_Summary: DOJ partially released files Dec 19, missed transparency deadline. NYT exposed copy-paste redaction failures Dec 23. Over 1M additional documents discovered.
Additional_Sources: ABC News, CNBC, NPR, TIME, Al Jazeera
Notes_on_Accuracy: Less than 1% released as of Jan 2026; victims accused DOJ of legal violations

Claim_Description: Omeed Malik/1789 Capital funded Tucker Carlson Network
Evidence_Summary: 1789 Capital invested $15M seed in Carlson's Last Country (Oct 2023). Malik is 1789 Capital president; co-founded with Rebekah Mercer.
Notes_on_Accuracy: TCN later became profitable and bought out investors

Claim_Description: Malik worked at MF Global and Bank of America Prime Brokerage
Evidence_Summary: Malik was SVP at MF Global before becoming MD and Global Head of Hedge Fund Advisory at BofA Merrill Lynch (2012-2018). Left after disputed misconduct allegations.
Notes_on_Accuracy: Settled legal claims with BofA; appointed to Fannie Mae board 2025

Claim_Description: Saudi Sanabil Investments has LP stake in Thiel's funds
Evidence_Summary: Sanabil publicly lists Founders Fund among ~50 VC funds invested in. Peter Thiel's Valar Ventures co-led $110M round with Sanabil in 2025.
Notes_on_Accuracy: Investment size/timing not specified by Sanabil

Claim_Description: China imposed 42.7% tariffs on EU dairy Dec 22-23
Evidence_Summary: Tariffs ranging 21.9%-42.7% took effect Dec 23, 2025. Part of trade retaliation for EU EV tariffs. EU called them unjustified.
Additional_Sources: ABC News, Euronews, Dairy Reporter, RTE
Notes_on_Accuracy: Final rates due Feb 21, 2026; estimated â‚¬120-280M annual cost to EU

Claim_Description: SoftBank divested from Alibaba to focus on AI/semiconductors
Evidence_Summary: SoftBank sold remaining Alibaba stake (from 24% at IPO to 0% by 2024), booking 1.26T yen gain. Shifted to AI-centric portfolio with Arm, Stargate, OpenAI focus.
Notes_on_Accuracy: Arm now 45%+ of SoftBank NAV; Vision Funds 29%

Claim_Description: 1994 UCC Article 8 revision changed securities ownership to entitlements
Evidence_Summary: 1994 UCC revision introduced 'security entitlement' concept - contractual claim rather than direct title. DTCC holds securities in Cede & Co name.
Additional_Sources: SEC filings, ABA reports, Going Postal
Notes_on_Accuracy: Great Taking documentary raises concerns; state-level amendments proposed

Evidence_Summary: Repository analysis shows 5 signal types converged: Epstein release (Dec 19), China tariffs (Dec 22), Wang Yi visit (Dec 14), Yemen strike (Dec 30), Graham rhetoric (Dec 16). Statistical anomaly z=2.35.
Additional_Sources: Multiple news sources verify individual events

Claim_Description: Soviet reflexive control theory as geopolitical framework
Evidence_Summary: Reflexive control is documented Soviet military doctrine defined as conveying prepared information to incline opponent to make predetermined decision.
Notes_on_Accuracy: Application to current events is theoretical interpretation

Claim_Description: CRINK (China-Russia-Iran-North Korea) formalized as analytical framework
Evidence_Summary: CSIS published CRINK diplomatic coordination analysis Sep 26, 2025. Framework used in multiple think tank publications 2025-2026.
